dishes.description: Double meat, gouda cheese, cheddar cheese, cooked ham, bacon, egg, salad and rustic potatoes.

dishes.name: U.S.A. Burger
dishes.description: Beef, gouda cheese, cheddar cheese, cooked ham, bacon, egg and salad.

dishes.name: Slices of Llanero Cheese
dishes.description: Ripe plantain with cheese and palm honey.

dishes.name: Papas Locas El Cabo
dishes.description: French fries with shredded chicken, gouda cheese and ham.

dishes.name: Cajun Ribs
dishes.description: For lovers of a spicy touch. Ribs bathed in our Original sauce accompanied by Cajun spices. Served with French fries and coleslaw.

dishes.name: The Original Baby Backs
dishes.description: The house specialty. Pork ribs cooked on the barbecue and marinated with our original barbecue sauce. Served with French fries and coleslaw.

dishes.name: Carolina Honey
dishes.description: Our famous ribs marinated with our Carolina honey sauce, a mixture of honey with our original sauce. Ideal for those looking for a sweet touch. Served with French fries and coleslaw.

dishes.name: Onion Rings
dishes.description: Los tradicionales aros de cebolla de tony roma´s dorados, crujientes y ligeros. Únicos en el mundo, acompañados de salsa BBQ.

dishes.name: Nachos Tony Roma's
dishes.description: The best selling nachos! with our blend of melted cheeses, accompanied by guacamole, crispy bacon, ranch beans, and sour cream.

dishes.name: Burger Mustang
dishes.description: Homemade bread, burger sauce, lettuce, sweet and sour pickle, bacon, cheddar and BBQ sauce. Beef 180 grams.

dishes.name: Alabama bread
dishes.description: Artisan bread, butter sauce, garlic, BBQ chicken and cheddar.

dishes.name: New York Burger
dishes.description: Homemade bread, lettuce, burger sauce, 180 grams of beef, goat cheese and roasted apple.

dishes.name: Mac & Cheese Burger
dishes.description: Homemade bread, lettuce, burger sauce, 180 grams of beef, mac and cheese, and American-style bacon.

dishes.name: Nachos Brothers
dishes.description: Nachos, guacamole, cheddar sauce, beans, bacon, and cream cheese.
